column4: Folks, I have a question. I have an Intel Quad Core processor (Q6600). Does it make sense to install Ubuntu 64 bit or would 32 bit do just fine ? what's the big advantage of 64 over 32 ?
I presently use this machine as my workstation, and I don't even do anything that significantly uses the horsepower.
and he means it when he says gyrations, i still don't have java working in ffx
